DataElement.preferredName: Computed Tomography Simulation Successful Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date a plan for radiation therapy that insures the target area is precisely located and marked using computed tomography (CT)  was successfully completed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis._In cancer treatment, a process used to plan radiation therapy so that the target area is precisely located and marked._An event that accomplishes its intended purpose._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.:In cancer treatment, a process used to plan radiation therapy so that the target area is precisely located and marked.

Concepts.definition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.

A technique which attempts to provide an abstract model of a particular system. It utilizes a mathematical model, which attempts to predict the behavior of the system from a set of parameters and initial conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: An event that accomplishes its intended purpose.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Lombardi Cancer Center clinical trial
